verbs.description: [ARG1: soldier] [V: deployed] [ARG2: overseas] surprises son at high school graduation army sgt damon solomon was granted special leave so he could watch his son receive his high school diploma and the surprise moved the graduate to tears tyler sgt damon solomon graduation high school
